thread.title: Escort dishes dirty details in juicy Q&A
thread.title_full: Escort dishes dirty details in juicy Q&A | New York Post

author: Sarah Burns, The Sun
title: Escort dishes dirty details in juicy Q&A
text:
A woman who claims to be an escort has revealed the tricks of the trade in a very candid Reddit thread.
The 25-year-old, who does not give her name but says she is from Australia, says she started working in a “high-profile brothel” five years ago.
Since then she has worked in six different sex houses across Sydney, Melbourne and Perth.
“In early 2014, fed up with brothel life, I moved to Perth to set myself up as a private escort,” she confesses online.
“One year later I had a mental breakdown and left the industry for nine months.
“I returned nearly a year ago, this time in Sydney and I haven’t looked back since.”
On the revealing forum, the woman says she charges up to £340 ($361) an hour, sees married men early in the morning and takes Ubers to and from jobs.
“I often see married clients early in the morning, eg. 7-8am,” she says.
“Even though they’re philandering, most still have some respect for their wives, if not as lovers, then as people, mothers.
“Many are in functioning, co-parenting relationships but live like roommates.”
She says that escorting can be a very unstable industry and work tends to die down around Christmastime.
“I went 23 December 2016 to 21 January 2017 without any bookings because it is typically the quietest time of year for the sex industry,” she said.
“Then suddenly it picked up massively and I’ve had 2-3 bookings per week since, averaging about 3 grand per week.
“Last October I didn’t get any bookings for about 3 weeks. It’s unpredictable to say the least.”
The 25-year-old wrote that she plans to retire in June in order to go get her master’s. Reddit Her usual clientele consists of businessmen age 40 and over, and she usually has the most fun with “fat men.”
“Most white-collar type professions, more Caucasian, Indian and Asian than other races, and mostly in the 40-60 age group,” she says.
“I’m happy with this, because these guys are well mannered and really generous.”
She also claims to have had sex with more than 1,100 men — and the oldest client she ever had was a Holocaust survivor.
She revealed she is not a “knock-out model” but channels the “girl-next-door type of look.”
Famous clients have included “NRL [National Rugby League] and union players” — although she has kept specific names under wraps.
She also states she’s open to many bizarre fantasies but will not do incest role play, water or mud sports or long bookings out of the city.
Her mother, best friends and ex-boyfriends know about her job as an escort — but she is afraid of her father and brothers finding out.
“I broke down and confessed everything to my parents about having been a sex worker for years about 2 years ago while I was on hiatus,” she wrote.
“Only my mum knows I’ve returned. She doesn’t want me to tell [my dad] because otherwise she’d ‘never hear the end of it.’
“But I think deep down he knows.”
She plans to “retire in June” when she is set to move overseas and study for a master’s degree.
 This article originally appeared on The Sun .
